ISSUE.TITLE: [V5] Cannot choose default value for date field in Content-Type Builder
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ## Bug report ### Required System information - Node.js version: v20.17.0 - NPM version: 10.8.2 - Strapi version: v5.0.0-rc.11 - Database: sqlite - Operating system: darwin-arm64 - Is your project Javascript or Typescript: TypeScript ### Describe the bug A clear and concise description of what the bug is. ### Steps to reproduce the behavior https://www.loom.com/share/b42f7cb66f9b440b8c431bba37ebdba1?sid=9a92fcc4-b294-47a7-8ac2-700a3ad5e9f6 1. Go to Content-Type Builder 2. Click on any collection, add a date field. 3. Add a name, chose type as either `date` or `date time` (they both trigger the bug) 4. Go to Advanced Settings, try to select a default value. 5. See error. ### Expected behavior being able to select a default value with the format chosen from step 3. ### Screenshots ### Additional context Might be related to #20875 but not exactly the same behaviour. #
